name: Tomb Raider Collection
overview: Tomb Raider is a series of action-adventure movies, centering around the exploits of Lara Croft, a fictional British archaeologist-adventurer.

parts.overview: English aristocrat Lara Croft is skilled in hand-to-hand combat and in the midst of a battle with a secret society. The shapely archaeologist moonlights as a tomb raider to recover lost antiquities and meets her match in the wicked Powell, who's in search of a powerful relic.
parts.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider

parts.original_title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider - The Cradle of Life
parts.overview: Tasked by MI6 to find the mythological Pandora's Box, an ancient object supposedly containing one of the deadliest plagues on Earth, Lara Croft must beat evil Nobel Prize-winning scientist turned bioterrorist Jonathan Reiss to it.
parts.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider - The Cradle of Life
